title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When attempting to import a project, the import feature currently lacks a default folder selection, requiring manual navigation each time.
EB: It would be beneficial if the import functionality could remember the last folder from which I imported a project. This would improve user experience and efficiency.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the 'Import/Export' section.
2. Select 'Import Project.'
3. Observe that there is no default folder pre-selected for project imports.
4. Manually navigate to the desired folder and import a project.
5. Close the application and reopen it.
6. Navigate again to the 'Import/Export' section and select 'Import Project.'
7. Verify if the previously used folder is automatically pre-selected. If not, the issue persists.
